title: Claiming the Don's Daughter
description: Alternate cover edition for ASIN B018WZ4WB2For previous cover edition see hereTemptation is too sweet when the don’s daughter offers her full submission, but when her father finds out, he’ll probably wind up swimming with the fishes. Carlo couldn't believe Summer -- the don's daughter -- was dancing half-naked on the stage of a strip club. Nor could he believe she suggested he'd be the one to take a belt to her ass and set her straight. But he'd had a thing for Summer since the day he moved in with her family, fresh off a plane from Sicily. He couldn't walk away from the opportunity to get up-close and intimate, and show her his dominant side.Giving control of her body to mafia underboss Carlo Romano was dangerous. More dangerous than her hair-brained idea to take off her clothes at a strip club as a form of sex therapy. But Carlo's dominance made her feel sexy, alive and appealing, feelings she'd scarcely known after two years with her cheating and demoralizing ex-boyfriend. Still, Summer may not be ready for a new relationship, and even if she is, there's the not-so-small matter of what her parents would say -- her father would kill Carlo if he found out he'd seen her naked...
author: Renee Rose
